patthana21.24:1.1_0: Nanahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.24:2.1_0: Nanahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.24:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.24:3.1_1: Nanahetuṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Dukamūlaṁ ekaṁ saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.24:4.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
